General.Name: Africa Opportunity Fund Ltd
General.Description: Africa Opportunity Fund Limited is close ended balanced mutual fund launched and managed by Africa Opportunity Partners Limited. The fund invests in equity and fixed income markets of Africa. It seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund invests in equity, debt, and other interests in both listed and unlisted assets. Africa Opportunity Fund Limited was formed on July 26, 2007 and is domiciled in Cayman Islands.
General.Address: PO Box 309 GT, George Town, Cayman Islands
